message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering it to you at a special price of $500000, hoping to share its unparalleled quality with someone who appreciates its true worth.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1000000 to $1500000. I would like to make a counteroffer at $1000000.
